nodes.text: Carshotta was a Togruta female who performed in Preigo's Traveling World of Wonder carnival act. She and another Togruta performed an act involving Convorees. The two performers wore colorful skin-tight outfits with loose bits of flowing transparent cloth.
While on Florrum, the traveling circus went to Hondo Ohnaka's pirate stronghold and picked up the young Jedi Initiates Katooni, Petro, Byph, Gungi, and Zatt on the way.
After the young Jedi initiates rescued Ahsoka Tano, Ohnaka's pirate gang attacked them, forcing the carnival to retreat. Carshotta was seen also escaping aboard Preigo's ship.
